data.message: Slim, you killed it again!!! My wife and I have been rebuying your albums recently. Letting our new generation listen. "Slim Shady LP" came out when I was still a teenager when I still "had to hide the tape from my parents like a bad report card." And I am still a diehard fan. No matter your highs or lows, you have a fan for life! You are truly an inspiration to us "scrawny lookin' white boys". Throughout the years your words and songs have helped shape me into the man I am today. Keep on flowin' Em...
